full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Can you please make the following changes in the accessories catalogue https://phonakmarketing.com.au/accessories-batteries-and-cleaning-kits/ under the category 'Chargers and batteries'

  1. Change the title for this tile to 'Charger Combi BTE'

  1. Also update the image for the above tile to this image below:




  1. Change title for this tile to 'Charger BTE/RIC'



  1. Create a new title titled 'Charge and Care' and add the two attached images - charge and care open and closed
  2. Create a new tile titled 'Charger Combi Case' and add the attached image - Charger case combi open.
  3. Create a new tile titled 'Life Charger' and add the attached - Life Charger open and closed images
  4. Create a new tile titled 'Charger Case Go' and add the attached - Charger case go open and closed images
  5. Create a new tile titled 'Charger Ease' and add the images in the link below

Charger Ease

FYI is a pic below of all the charger for your reference.
